#summary Setting Up LATEX With Notepad++ and  SumatraPDF

== Notepad++ ==

  # In the `Notepad++` environment, go to the main menuâ€™s `Plugins -> NPPExec -> Execute`, or press `F6`

  # Enter  in the window that pops-up
{{{
NPP_SAVE
cd "$(CURRENT_DIRECTORY)"
pdflatex --synctex=-1 "$(FULL_CURRENT_PATH)"
}}}

== SumatraPDF ==
  In the SumatraPDF go to the menu `Settings -> Options...` enter stroke for inverse search:
{{{
"<path to>\notepad++.exe" -n%l "%f"
}}}
